title: What About Us
lyrics: What about us? What about all the broken happy ever afters?

title: Praying
lyrics: I hope you're somewhere praying, I hope your soul is changing, I hope you find your peace.

title: Just the Way You Are
lyrics: When I see your face, there's not a thing that I would change,'cause you're amazing just the way you are.

title: Stand by You
lyrics: Even if we can't find heaven, I'll walk through hell with you. I'll stand by you.

title: Somewhere I Belong
lyrics: I wanna heal, I wanna feel like I'm close to something real. I wanna find something I've wanted all alongâ€”somewhere I belong.
